author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Grant Richards I am surprised that you have not replied to my note of a week ago in which I begged you to let me know your decision as to my book Dubliners. The preface (which I sent you on at your managerâ€™s request) appeared in the current issue of The Egoist of 15 January last. I must ask you therefore to let me hear from you by return of post as I am most anxious to have the affair concluded one way or the other. Sincerely yours James Joyce
